name: Astral Ascent (itch) (Snapgon)
description:
A short space shooter made for the Bored Pixel Jam 9 over two weeks. Your goals are to survive, reach the star, or get a high score. 

Features:

  • A Boss
  • 5 Weapons
  • Around 35 room segments

How to play

A/Left to move Left, D/Right to move left

W,Up, Space, and Left Click to shoot

Esc to pause(Use if the game freezes randomly)

Credits

Fonts used-

VCR OSD Mono by  Riciery Leal and 8-bit arcade by Damien Gosset. Both came from Dafont.com.

Music by Nojisuma on Pixabay.

Most Sound Effects were by KennyNL and the rest were generated in Chiptone by SFB games. 

All art was by me.
